text: Ej mardum, sumoro az jak tan ʙijofarid, ki u Odam ast. Va az on jak tan zanas Havvoro ofarid. Va ʙarojaton az corpojon hast cuft ʙijofarid: (naru moda az sutur, gov, gusfand va ʙuz). Sumoro dar sikami modaronaton dar cand marhala dar daruni torikihoi segona ofarinis ʙaxsid. In Allohi jakto, ki hama in cizhoro ʙijofarid, Parvardigori haqiqi va ma'ʙudi sumost. Farmonravoi dar dunjovu oxirat az oni Ust. Allohe ʙarhaq cuz U nest. Pas, ci guna az iʙodati Vaj ʙa sui parastisi digaron ʙargardonda mesaved
